A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I kind of miss when characters recognized they were flawed and realised they need their companions to win. That's what made Luke Skywalker so great\, and Rey not as great. Don't get me wrong\, Rey is a great character\, but she's no Luke. 

There were some really fantastic moments\, however there was way too much useless parts and horrible new characters. 

The Last Jedi was a lot of fun\, but it could have been way better.
